name: Ultimate ball run - avoid boxes and score as much as you can - hyper casual game
name_original: Ultimate ball run - avoid boxes and score as much as you can - hyper casual game
description:
This project is fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
Tap on the left side of the screen to move left and on right side to move right. Avoid boxes and score as much as you can. The boxes do gradually begin to come down faster and faster as the game progresses, and therefore the game becomes harder and harder.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
I hope you will like this template and please check out my other projects. 

Thank you!
